attributes.action: Let the police get heavy handed with the rioters, so we can have our country back
attributes.additional_details:
Whatever side of this cultural debate your on is now irrelevant.

NO ONE is going to visit NI when all they see on TV is people throwing bricks and burning out buses. It costing the economy millions and its costing local, hard working people their jobs. It has to come to an end.

Sign this petition in support of the police and law enforcement system taking a harder line with these protests so that we can all get on with the rest of our lives.
